attributes.additional_details: WiFi history on the routers are not good for privacy and children should have the right not to be monitored for there every move on the internet (blocking sites are fine looking at history and stopping the WiFi is not)
attributes.background: The WiFi control that can look at children's search history can stop the WiFi and remove them setting to be banned

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to allow telecommunications customers to set parental controls are a matter for individual internet providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
